articles.title: Mass. woman killed while sunbathing after car drives into residential pool area in Florida
articles.description:
Florida authorities said a preliminary investigation indicates that the driver may have suffered from a "medical episode" at the time of the crash.

The post Mass. woman killed while sunbathing after car drives into residential pool area in Florida appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts woman killed while sunbathing in Florida residential pool area on February 13.
Driver reportedly suffered a medical episode leading to the crash, according to authorities.
Incident raises safety concerns for Boston residents traveling to Florida vacation spots.

articles.title: Review & setlist: Brandi Carlile has tailored her ‘Human Tour’ to humans, beautifully
articles.description:
The Grammy winner played the second show of her first arena tour at TD Garden Thursday night.

The post Review & setlist: Brandi Carlile has tailored her ‘Human Tour’ to humans, beautifully appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Brandi Carlile performed at TD Garden on February 12, 2026, for her 'Human Tour'.
The concert marks Carlile's second show on her first arena tour.
Local residents enjoyed a tailored performance, enhancing Boston's cultural scene.

articles.title: Delta is bringing back direct flights between Boston and Hawaii
articles.description:
The service begins Dec. 19.

The post Delta is bringing back direct flights between Boston and Hawaii appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Delta resumes direct flights from Boston to Hawaii starting December 19.
Flights will provide Boston residents with easier access to Hawaii's tourism.
Increased travel options may boost local economy and tourism-related businesses.

articles.title: A renovated Lake Winnipesaukee escape, plus new nonstop flights to Canada
articles.description:
Take a peak inside Mill Falls Resort Collection’s resort-wide makeover — plus a look at new Boston-to-Canada routes launching in May.

The post A renovated Lake Winnipesaukee escape, plus new nonstop flights to Canada appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mill Falls Resort Collection completed a major renovation to enhance guest experience.
New nonstop flights from Boston to Canada will begin in May 2024.
Boston residents gain easier access to Lake Winnipesaukee and Canadian destinations.

articles.title: Justice Department sues Harvard for data as it investigates how race factors into admissions
articles.description:
In a lawsuit filed Friday in federal court in Massachusetts, the Justice Department said Harvard has “thwarted” efforts to investigate potential discrimination.

The post Justice Department sues Harvard for data as it investigates how race factors into admissions appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Justice Department filed a lawsuit against Harvard on February 13, 2026.
Harvard accused of obstructing investigation into racial discrimination in admissions.
Potential implications for Boston students seeking equitable college admissions.

articles.title: Brayan Bello reflects on rough playoff start, enters Red Sox camp with new pitch
articles.description:
Bello is now throwing a curveball after logging a 5.40 ERA last September.

The post Brayan Bello reflects on rough playoff start, enters Red Sox camp with new pitch appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Brayan Bello introduces a new curveball pitch at Red Sox spring training.
Bello recorded a 5.40 ERA during the playoffs last September.
Improved pitching could enhance the Red Sox's performance for Boston fans this season.
